Dimensions

0 types of stuff drawn as
colors		 "animal"
1 judgements relate types strings
connect colors		 animal $a$
eats
plant $p$
2 inferences relate judgements beads
connect strings		 if
$a$ eats $p$
then
$a$ gets $p$
